text: Mattias Lindgren (born 30 March 1972) is a Swedish rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Sweden Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Dalarna
title: Mattias Lindgren
